## TileKey.atCoords() method

Returns the closest matching `TileKey` in a cartesian coordinate system.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
static atCoords(level: number, coordX: number, coordY: number, totalWidth: number, totalHeight: number): TileKey;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  level | number | The level for the tile key. |
|  coordX | number | The X coordinate. |
|  coordY | number | The Y coordinate. |
|  totalWidth | number | The maximum X coordinate. |
|  totalHeight | number | The maximum Y coordinate. |

<b>Returns:</b>

[TileKey](./harp-geoutils.tilekey.md)

A new tile key at the given level that includes the given coordinates.
